text:
FREE
   Welcome to TextMaker!
   A quick start guide you can edit, share and print

FreeOffice TextMaker lets you create attractive documents of any size in no time. To help you get started, we have
summarized some of the most important functions in this document. You can also use this document to record your
own notes.

Create documents at lightning speed using attractive templates
Do you just want to write a letter? It couldn’t be easier: Click File | New to go straight to the dialog box for selecting a
suitable document template. In the “Business letters” or “Personal letters” folder, select a template and get started
immediately:
  Yollage                    Enlcht:
       Vodonen                                                                                                                shieden
         Deutach
         English (VS]
                                      gechaitibid 1                Gechaltebik Z
    Lerunbare Sprchal
If you entered your address the first time you started FreeOffice TextMaker, it will now be used automatically in your
document. If you haven’t done that yet, don’t worry about it as you can still do so using the User info button on the
“General” tab under File | Options.

Practical: In all included letter templates, the fields for the recipient’s address are positioned so that they are printed
in exactly the right position when using standard window envelopes.

# Welcome to TextMaker!

A quick start guide you can edit, share and print

FreeOffice TextMaker lets you create attractive documents of any size in no time. To help you get started, we have summarized some of the most important functions in this document. You can also use this document to record your own notes.

# Create documents at lightning speed using attractive templates

Do you just want to write a letter? It couldn’t be easier: Click File | New to go straight to the dialog box for selecting a suitable document template. In the “Business letters” or “Personal letters” folder, select a template and get started immediately:

|Yollage|Enlcht:|
|---|---|
|Vodonen| |
|Deutach| |
|English (VS]| |
|gechaitibid 1|Gechaltebik Z|
|Lerunbare Sprchal| |

If you entered your address the first time you started FreeOffice TextMaker, it will now be used automatically in your document. If you haven’t done that yet, don’t worry about it as you can still do so using the User info button on the “General” tab under File | Options.

Practical: In all included letter templates, the fields for the recipient’s address are positioned so that they are printed in exactly the right position when using standard window envelopes.

text:
Format text according to your needs
Regardless of whether you open a document template, create a new document or open an existing file: FreeOffice
TextMaker allows you to adjust the formatting of your text exactly to your needs. The quickest way to do this is to use
the commands on the ribbon tab Home:
 Calibri                                                        Aa
              W ~ | a           X;X A                                   At  A"       5840 I
                                   Zeichen                                                                Absatz
Select the text that you want to format and then apply the desired formatting by clicking on the appropriate icon.

Overview of some of the most important formatting commands:

           Bold formatting (shortcut key: Ctrl+B)

           Italic formatting (shortcut key: Ctrl+I)

           Underline (shortcut key: Ctrl+U)

           Text highlighting

           Font color

             Bulleted list

           1. Numbering

Tip: If you are creating a large document, you will probably want to format all headings, numbering, captions, etc. in
consistent styles. In this case, we recommend using paragraph and character styles rather than working directly with
the above commands. These styles can be found under Home | Styles or in the right sidebar.

If you like, you can try out the functionality of paragraph and character styles directly in this document. To do so,
simply click to place the cursor in the following paragraph:

                                    >> Click here to place cursor <<
Then right-click on Heading 1 under “Paragraph styles” in the right sidebar and select Update from text in the popup
menu. You will see that all headings in this document now change their appearance in the same manner. Thus
paragraph and character styles save you a lot of time, especially when working with larger documents.
md:
# Format text according to your needs

Regardless of whether you open a document template, create a new document or open an existing file: FreeOffice TextMaker allows you to adjust the formatting of your text exactly to your needs. The quickest way to do this is to use the commands on the ribbon tab Home:

Calibri                                                        Aa

W ~ | a           X;X A                                   At  A"       5840 I

Zeichen                                                                Absatz

Select the text that you want to format and then apply the desired formatting by clicking on the appropriate icon.

# Overview of some of the most important formatting commands:

- Bold formatting (shortcut key: Ctrl+B)
- Italic formatting (shortcut key: Ctrl+I)
- Underline (shortcut key: Ctrl+U)
- Text highlighting
- Font color
- Bulleted list
- Numbering

Tip: If you are creating a large document, you will probably want to format all headings, numbering, captions, etc. in consistent styles. In this case, we recommend using paragraph and character styles rather than working directly with the above commands. These styles can be found under Home | Styles or in the right sidebar.

If you like, you can try out the functionality of paragraph and character styles directly in this document. To do so, simply click to place the cursor in the following paragraph:

>> Click here to place cursor <<

Then right-click on Heading 1 under “Paragraph styles” in the right sidebar and select Update from text in the popup menu. You will see that all headings in this document now change their appearance in the same manner. Thus paragraph and character styles save you a lot of time, especially when working with larger documents.

Tip: If you are creating a large document, you will probably want to format all headings, numbering, captions, etc. in consistent styles. In this case, we recommend using paragraph and character styles rather than working directly with the above commands. These styles can be found under Home | Styles or in the right sidebar.

If you like, you can try out the functionality of paragraph and character styles directly in this document. To do so, simply click to place the cursor in the following paragraph:

>> Click here to place cursor <<

Then right-click on Heading 1 under “Paragraph styles” in the right sidebar and select Update from text in the popup menu. - Bold formatting (shortcut key: Ctrl+B)
- Italic formatting (shortcut key: Ctrl+I)
- Underline (shortcut key: Ctrl+U)
- Text highlighting
- Font color
- Bulleted list
- Numbering

Tip: If you are creating a large document, you will probably want to format all headings, numbering, captions, etc. in consistent styles. In this case, we recommend using paragraph and character styles rather than working directly with the above commands. These styles can be found under Home | Styles or in the right sidebar.

If you like, you can try out the functionality of paragraph and character styles directly in this document. To do so, simply click to place the cursor in the following paragraph:

>> Click here to place cursor <<

Then right-click on Heading 1 under “Paragraph styles” in the right sidebar and select Update from text in the popup menu. You will see that all headings in this document now change their appearance in the same manner. Thus paragraph and character styles save you a lot of time, especially when working with larger documents.

text:
Write with confidence – thanks to the automatic spell check
FreeOffice TextMaker ensures error-free sentences while you type. To enable the automatic spell check, simply select
Check spelling as you type from the Spell check dropdown menu on the ribbon tab Review:
      ABC
   Rechtschreib-          Deutsch              Silben-
    prufung          (Deutschland)          trennung
        Rechtschreibprufung-
        Rechtschreibung bei der Eingabe uberprufen
        Worterbucher bearbeiten;
   Einstellyngen_
All spelling mistakes in your document are then automatically highlighted with a red underline. Right-click on the
misspelled words to see alternative suggestions for the correct spelling or to add unknown terms to your user
dictionary.

Enhance your document with images and objects
Would you like to illustrate your text with pictures? Do you want to insert impactful slogans? Would you like to design
your own layouts with drawings? It couldn’t be easier: The ribbon tab Insert provides a whole range of objects that
you can include in your document:
                                                           TextArt-Objekt
   Grafik
              rahmenText-  AutoForm         Linien         OLE-Objektrahmen
                                        Objekte
Simply select any object and click in your document to insert it.

Design sophisticated layouts in object mode
If you insert multiple objects (pictures, drawings, etc.) into a document, TextMaker’s unique object mode ensures that
you always have an overview. Once enabled, you can select and edit object frames with the mouse as usual, but not
body text. This lets you avoid inadvertent text changes in documents containing lots of objects.
md:
# Write with confidence – thanks to the automatic spell check

FreeOffice TextMaker ensures error-free sentences while you type. To enable the automatic spell check, simply select Check spelling as you type from the Spell check dropdown menu on the ribbon tab Review:

|ABC|Rechtschreib-|Deutsch|Silben-|trennung|
|---|---|---|---|---|
|Rechtschreibprufung-|Rechtschreibung bei der Eingabe uberprufen|Worterbucher bearbeiten;|Einstellyngen_| |

All spelling mistakes in your document are then automatically highlighted with a red underline. Right-click on the misspelled words to see alternative suggestions for the correct spelling or to add unknown terms to your user dictionary.

# Enhance your document with images and objects

Would you like to illustrate your text with pictures? Do you want to insert impactful slogans? Would you like to design your own layouts with drawings? It couldn’t be easier: The ribbon tab Insert provides a whole range of objects that you can include in your document:

TextArt-Objekt
Grafik
rahmenText-
AutoForm
Linien
OLE-Objektrahmen
Simply select any object and click in your document to insert it.

# Design sophisticated layouts in object mode

If you insert multiple objects (pictures, drawings, etc.) into a document, TextMaker’s unique object mode ensures that you always have an overview. Once enabled, you can select and edit object frames with the mouse as usual, but not body text. This lets you avoid inadvertent text changes in documents containing lots of objects.

text:
To enable object mode, click on the mouse cursor icon in the Quick access toolbar below the ribbon:

            Toggle text mode and object mode

Save compatible documents
The first time you save a file in FreeOffice TextMaker, you will be asked whether you prefer DOCX or TMDX as the file
format. If you regularly exchange files with Microsoft Word users, you may want to select DOCX, the standard
Microsoft Word file format:
 Kompatibilitatsassistent
      SoftMaker Office unterstutzt zahlreiche verschiedene Dateiformate: Bitte wahlen Sie die
      Dateiformate; die standardmaBig verwendet werden sollen_
           Wahlen Sie diese Option; um einfach Dokumente mit den Benutzern anderer
          Officepakete wie Microsoft Office auszutauschen;
           SoftMaker-Office-Dateiformate: TMDX PMDX und PRDX
           Wahlen Sie diese Option; um Dateiformate zu verwenden; die alle Features von
           SoftMaker Office unterstutzen:
      Sie konnen das Standarddateiformat jederzeit in den Einstellungen andern (Karteikarte
      "Dateien").
                                                                                                Abbrechen
This enables Microsoft Word users to continue working on your documents directly – without prior conversion.
md:
To enable object mode, click on the mouse cursor icon in the Quick access toolbar below the ribbon:

# Toggle text mode and object mode

# Save compatible documents

The first time you save a file in FreeOffice TextMaker, you will be asked whether you prefer DOCX or TMDX as the file format. If you regularly exchange files with Microsoft Word users, you may want to select DOCX, the standard Microsoft Word file format:

# Kompatibilitatsassistent

SoftMaker Office unterstutzt zahlreiche verschiedene Dateiformate: Bitte wahlen Sie die Dateiformate; die standardmaBig verwendet werden sollen_

- Wahlen Sie diese Option; um einfach Dokumente mit den Benutzern anderer Officepakete wie Microsoft Office auszutauschen;
- SoftMaker-Office-Dateiformate: TMDX PMDX und PRDX
- Wahlen Sie diese Option; um Dateiformate zu verwenden; die alle Features von SoftMaker Office unterstutzen:

Sie konnen das Standarddateiformat jederzeit in den Einstellungen andern (Karteikarte "Dateien").

This enables Microsoft Word users to continue working on your documents directly – without prior conversion.

text:
Here you can find additional information
We hope this quick start guide will give you an initial overview of the numerous features of FreeOffice TextMaker.
More information on all program functions can be found in the manual and in the help file. You can access both by
clicking on the small question mark icon in the upper right corner:
             Hilfe
             Benutzerhandbuch
            SoftMaker im Internet
            Lizenz verwalten _
            Kundendienst_
            Nach Updates suchen
             Uber;
Tip: If you need help in relation to a specific function on the ribbon or in a dialog box, you can open the corresponding
chapter of the documentation directly by positioning the mouse cursor over the command in question and pressing F1
on your keyboard.

We hope you continue to enjoy using FreeOffice TextMaker!

Your SoftMaker team

Testing//

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wofB1wzyYYI

GitHub

https://github.com/VikParuchuri/marker/blob/master/tests/renderers/test_markdown_renderer.py

# Additional Information

We hope this quick start guide will give you an initial overview of the numerous features of FreeOffice TextMaker.

More information on all program functions can be found in the manual and in the help file. You can access both by clicking on the small question mark icon in the upper right corner:

- Hilfe
- Benutzerhandbuch
- SoftMaker im Internet
- Lizenz verwalten
- Kundendienst
- Nach Updates suchen
- Über

Tip: If you need help in relation to a specific function on the ribbon or in a dialog box, you can open the corresponding chapter of the documentation directly by positioning the mouse cursor over the command in question and pressing F1 on your keyboard.

We hope you continue to enjoy using FreeOffice TextMaker!

Your SoftMaker team
